channel.title: Error message and error in game now, please help
channel.description:
Ok when i sign onto my server, i get this [code]
Exception in "Thread-5" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero at client.method34(client.java:1400) at client.method146(client.java:11914) at client.method102(client.java:7747) at client.method9(client.java:8620) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126) at client.run(client.java:4450) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
[/code] It is in the runmoparscape.bat window
now ingame, almsot ne monster i atk it hits 0 and it dies, i checked, they all have health and stuff still[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 01:53:30 AM[/size][hr]cmon please advise me

item.title: Error message and error in game now, please help
item.dc:creator: @dracar dracar
item.description:
@dracar wrote:

Ok when i sign onto my server, i get this


Exception in "Thread-5" java.lang.ArithmeticException: / by zero
         at client.method34(client.java:1400)
         at client.method146(client.java:11914)
         at client.method102(client.java:7747)
         at client.method9(client.java:8620)
         at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:126)
         at client.run(client.java:4450)
         at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

It is in the runmoparscape.bat window

now ingame, almsot ne monster i atk it hits 0 and it dies, i checked, they all have health and stuff still[br][size=1]Posted on: December 28, 2006, 01:53:30 AM[/size][hr]cmon please advise me
